bio: I believe there is a digital world with brands, ownership, and entertainment. I am actively building one at https://anotherworld.gg.
contributionDescription:
1. We won OP's hackathon prizes and keep building it into a game-like digital world where players are 3D avatars to continue their web3/NFT adventures in a playful way. NFTs are usable in players' inventory. Tokens are keys to unlock access and gameplay. 

2. Another World is an OP+OP-stack game. Game items are NFTs airdropped via Optimism Mainnet. Our OP-stack is built for treasure-hunt battles where players win or lose on-chain items. We also supply in-game $OP airdrops for players who retrieve certain game items.

3. Another World showcases a simplified UX for both web3 and web2 players to enter a 3D world. Web3 players opt-in by typing in ENS at the entry menu while web2 users are free to play using an URL. 

4. Our progress and game sample codes are open-source on GitHub.

contributionLinks.description: Main site with a "web-based preview" to enter Another World
We constantly iterate and release new experiments for building a digital world.
We open sourced an Unreal Engine sample project with built-in token airdrops.
Another World is a Growth Experiments Cycle 11 grantee

Another World was born as an OP prize winner in ETH Global SF Hackathon 2022
NFT game item airdrop (via OP mainnet) raw footage
Player receives $OP when picking up a game item
We open source all gameplay-related smart contracts
Our internal chain for treasure hunting battles using OP-stack via Conduit
Game Prize contract that drips $OP to players who acquired certain game item

impactDescription:
1. We are actively alpha-testing an OP + OP-stack powered digital world with web users and gamers on Epic Games Store and HyperPlay.

2. Another World is bringing Bored Ape Yacht Club members and ApeCoin DAO communities into the Superchain ecosystem through a series of game-related activities and received top votes from the ApeCoinDAO community to fund further experiments.

3. We showcased the shortest path from the official website to entering a 3D world using a web browser. Players can experience the gameplay first before using their wallets.

4. Our open-source Unreal Engine game sample and in-game airdrop mechanism (serverless + contracts) can bring more game devs into the ecosystem and reduce the friction of in-game token airdrops.
